description:
Bunji and Daichi are out fishing for crawfish and loving it. They are using smoked squid for bait, but the giant blue crawfish doesn`t take to it. They wonder why and then... Fumi and Dad go to a department to shop for clothes. They go into a "gal" event and Fumi gets into a conversation. Dad is quickly left out. Bunji says he wants to be an astronaut. Dad, completely drunk, grabs a swimming ring and goggles and says he`ll train him to become one. Bunji goes with his class to a space museum. Bunji spouts off the suspect info regarding space he learned from Dad and his classmates make fun of him. But the astronaut goes to Bunji and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crawfish / Dad`s Pure Heart / Astronaut / To Be An Astronaut
Zarigani / Chichi no Jun Kokoro / Uchuuhikoushi / Uchuuhikoushi ni Naru
ザリガニ / 父の純心 / 宇宙飛行士 / 宇宙飛行士になる
